name: Karen Strauss
offering: Amazon Best Seller Campaigns, Book Cover Design, Book Editing and Layout, Book Launches, Book Marketing, Book Publishing, Book Writing Coach, Compilation Books, Ghost Writers, Publishing Services

jv_history.source_quote: I am an organisational change management rebel with a cause. I am an author, sought after keynote speaker, coach mentor and facilitator. My latest and fourth book, "Balanced Diversity

what_you_do: Hybrid Global Publishing is a firm that works with Entrepreneurs, Speakers, and coaches to help them write, publish, distribute, and promote their books in order to generate unlimited leads, get on more speaking stages, and grow their business by attracting more clients.
social_proof: Karen has helped over 1000 business owners become successful published authors and has helped 700 authors reach #1 bestselling status.
business_focus: Hybrid Global Publishing helps entrepreneurs, speakers, and coaches write, publish, distribute, and promote their books.
